snippet.title: Large wine cellar and private bar makes entertaining guests a treat - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
A two-level penthouse in St Lucia is for sale with 360 degree views across the Brisbane River, and CBD. The property at has four bedrooms and two bathrooms.
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
Place - Kangaroo Point selling agent Simon Caulfield said there was a large wine cellar and private bar which would bring entertaining guests to another level.
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
Mr Caulfield said a feature glass media room positioned nearby made for fantastic indoor entertainment and created a sense of space in the central living area complimented by the ascending glass void above.
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
14/100 Macquarie Street, St Lucia.
The property has been marketed as having a child and pet friendly rooftop, catering for the entire family, making downsizing easier than ever. Expressions of interest close by 5pm on August 15.
